teaser: Marketplace Tech talks to the CEO of SmartThings about controlling your house from your smartphone or tablet, hears from a mom about iPad etiquette, and learns more about the FCC’s plan for spectrum.
byline: David Brancaccio, Jim Burress and Janell Burley Hofmann
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, February 7, 2013
description: Marketplace Tech talks to the CEO of SmartThings about controlling your house from your smartphone or tablet, hears from a mom about iPad etiquette, and learns more about the FCC’s plan for spectrum.
